13.title: The Indie Gathering Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: In this special, I'll highlight some of the feature films coming to The Indie Gathering International Film Festival. Films featured are: Thursday's Speaker, Risky Business: A Look Inside America's Adult Film Industry, The Unusual (Calling of) Charlie Christmas, UNAVAILABLE, Axe Giant: The Wrath of Paul Bunyan, SOFT GUN., Chill, On the North Coast, The Promoter, Dark Wake, Locomotive, A Clown's Recovery, Krampus: The Christmas Devil, Flying Paper, The Essentials, LOVE: As Your Like It, SWAN Day CT: The 5th Year and A.M. Mayhem: The Story of Tuscon's Power 1490AM.

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

15.title: Joe Estevez Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Interview with Joe Estevez; Joe's induction into The International Indie Filmmakers Hall of Fame at The Indie Gathering International Film Festival; clips from Joe's seminar at The Indie Gathering; Trailer for High on the Hog; Trailer for Doonby; Trailer for The Haunting of Pearon Place; Trailer for Rough Hustle.

16.title: Axe Giant Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: This episode of The Reel Show highlights the film "Axe Giant: The Wrath of Paul Bunyan". It features interviews with director Gary Jones and actor Chris Hahn, a discussion of the film, and the trailer.

17.title: Episode #3.17

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: An interview with D.Cruise from the all-girl band 11after; the short romantic-drama "Hi"; an interview with writer/producer Mara Lesemann; trailer for the film Available; and trailers for the web series "The Circuit".

18.title: Krampus Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: This episode features the premiere of "Krampus: The Christmas Devil". Interviews with: filmmaker Jason Hull, actors Rich Goteri and Mike Mili, filmmaker/actor AJ Leslie, executive producer Darin Foltz, composer Aaron Forsyth; footage from the "Krampus" premiere; trailer for the film.

19.title: ICE Agent Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: This episode highlights the indie action film "ICE Agent". Interviews with: Ray O'Neill, Bill Johns, Mike Trivisonno, William Alexander, Terry G, and E Ray Goodwin. Also featuring deleted scenes, bloopers and the official trailer for the film.

20.title: Episode #3.20

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Interview with filmmaker Susan Hippen; Short film "Will"; Interview with filmmaker Pavel Nikolaev; Trailer for documentary "Lion Ark"; Short film "Our Lady Divine"; Interview with singer/songwriter Aoede

1.title: Episode #4.1

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: This episode highlights FilmCleveland! and also features an interview with the founders of FANtastic Horror Film Festival.

2.title: Episode #4.2

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

3.title: Episode #4.3

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: This episode features the short crime-drama "Keelhaul", an interview with Katie Marzullo and Kristin West, and the short drama "Benevolent Stranger".

4.title: Episode #4.4

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: This episode features an interview with screenwriter Charice Long; trailer for "Dreams"; short film "The Wing Eater"; interview with actor/writer Marv Blauvelt.

5.title: Wu on Fan Films

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: This episode is a special from "Wu on Fan Films", an event featuring fan films produced by award-winning filmmaker Johnny Wu and highlighting his new Doctor Who web series, "T.R.A.C.E." The episode features interviews with filmmakers Johnny Wu, Mike Bacanu and Robert Banks, and actors Jason Wang, Justin McDonough and Rex Baker. You'll also see trailers for "A Joker's Card" and "S: A Superman Fan Film", the full first episode of "T.R.A.C.E.", and a discussion with cast/crew.

6.title: The 2014 Indie Gathering

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: This episode highlights many feature films from The 2014 Indie Gathering International Film Festival.

10.title: The Perfect Candidate

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: This episode is a special on the short comedy "The Perfect Candidate", featuring an interview with writers/producers Joe Randazzo and Sean Steffen and a look at the film.

1.title: Christine at the Crossroads Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: This special was shot at the "Christine at the Crossroads" Ohio premiere. Featuring interviews with Heather Smith, Ernie Smith, Pam Myers, Andy Matas, Wellyem Guerra, Phil Gigliotti, Curtis Hare and Bruno Tatalovic, as well as the official teaser and a clip from the film.

2.title: Episode #5.2

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: This episode features an interview with Rich McKee and Jodi Beth of RJ Productions and clips from their film "Confidentiel"; interview with writer Amy McCorkle; interview with director Joy Millana and the trailer for "Premeditated", now being released as "Profiled"; and an interview with writer Vicky Neal.

3.title: Behind the Scenes Special

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: This episode features an interview with actor/host Philip Saad and behind the scenes videos for "Detours", "T.R.A.C.E.", "The Crimson Ranger" and "Rotor DR1".

episode of.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: This episode features the short crime-drama "Triad", an interview with filmmaker Jason Wang, concept trailer for "Project E. 1337" and the micro horror film "Daddy".

imdb.plot outline: Our goal at The Reel Show is to bring independent filmmakers a place to showcase their hard work, not just around the country but around the world. We want to connect anyone involved or interested in indie filmmaking, to expand their circle into a worldwide web of connections. Our show brings you an opportunity unlike any other. You'll see short films, exciting interviews, exclusive footage, sneak peeks and more!
imdb.title: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle
akas: The Reel Show with Kristina Michelle (United States)
plot: Your gateway into the world of independent filmmaking.::The Reel Show

Our goal at The Reel Show is to bring independent filmmakers a place to showcase their hard work, not just around the country but around the world. We want to connect anyone involved or interested in indie filmmaking, to expand their circle into a worldwide web of connections. Our show brings you an opportunity unlike any other. You'll see short films, exciting interviews, exclusive footage, sneak peeks and more!::The Reel Show
